title: [模版] crackshot的枪械模版
author: Imziqi
txt_content:
最近手残写了几个枪械模版希望大家如果想用的话可以录用
巴雷特:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&f&LBarrett-M82A1 "
        Item_Type: 293
        Item_Lore: "&8&m----------------------------|&7&L类型: 狙击枪|&7&l武器等级: 6|&7&l伤害: 25|&7&l爆头伤害: 32|&7&l射程: 远|&7&l装弹数量: 8|&8&m----------------------------|&b&l特殊: 左键瞄准镜|&a&l死亡掉落"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 25
        Recoil_Amount: 2
        Bullet_Spread: 0.8
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Remove_Arrows_On_Impact: true
        Projectile_Speed: 1000
        Projectile_Damage: 25
        Sounds_Shoot: SKELETON_HURT-1-2-0,ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-2-0,PISTON_EXTEND-1-2-2,PISTON_EXTEND-1-2-10
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: true
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 8
        Take_Ammo_On_Reload: true
        Reload_Duration: 60
        Sounds_Reloading: SKELETON_IDLE-1-0-10,PISTON_EXTEND-1-0-28,SKELETON_WALK-1-0-48
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-0.3-2-0
    Headshot:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 7
        Sounds_Shooter: NOTE_PLING-1-2-0
        Sounds_Victim: VILLAGER_DEATH-1-1-0
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Terrain: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: block_break-1
        Particle_Hit: block_break-152, block_break-11
        Particle_Impact_Anything: block_break-4, block_break-11
    Scope:
        Enable: true
        Zoom_Amount: 7
        Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 0.003
        Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: ENDERDRAGON_WINGS-1-2-0
    Potion_Effects:
        Activation: shoot
        Potion_Effect_Shooter: SLOW-20-2
机枪:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&fMini Gun"
        Item_Lore: "&7&l这把枪必须开启瞄准镜之后才能射击|&8&m----------------------------|&7&L类型: 机枪塔|&7&l武器等级: 5|&7&l伤害: 5|&7&L爆头伤害: 7|&7&l射程: 远|&7&l装弹数量: 300|&8&m----------------------------|&b&l特殊: 左键瞄准镜|&a&l死亡掉落"
        Item_Type: 286
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 0
        Recoil_Amount: 2
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: egg
        Remove_Arrows_On_Impact: true
        Projectile_Speed: 35
        Projectile_Damage: 5
        Bullet_Spread: 1
        Reset_Fall_Distance: true
        Sounds_Shoot: ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-2-0,ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-0-0,GHAST_FIREBALL-1-2-0
        Removal_Or_Drag_Delay: 13-true
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: true
        Bullet_Spread: 0.5
    Fully_Automatic:
        Enable: true
        Fire_Rate: 7
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 300
        Reload_Bullets_Individually: false
        Reload_Duration: 90
        Sounds_Reloading: DOOR_OPEN-2-2-0,FIRE_IGNITE-2-1-4,FIRE_IGNITE-2-1-6,FIRE_IGNITE-2-1-8,FIRE_IGNITE-2-1-10,FIRE_IGNITE-2-1-12,FIRE_IGNITE-2-1-14,FIRE_IGNITE-2-1-16,FIRE_IGNITE-2-1-18,FIRE_IGNITE-2-1-20,CLICK-2-4-25,CLICK-2-3-30,CLICK-2-2-35,CLICK-2-1-40,NOTE_PLING-2-1-50,NOTE_PLING-2-1-60,NOTE_PLING-2-1-70,NOTE_PLING-2-1-80,NOTE_PLING-2-1-90
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Close_Duration: 10
        Sound_Close: PISTON_RETRACT-2-2-0,PISTON_RETRACT-2-2-1
    Headshot:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 2
        Message_Shooter: "&e爆头!"
        Message_Victim: "&e啊啊啊啊!"
        Sounds_Shooter: NOTE_PLING-1-2-0
        Sounds_Victim:
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
        Death_No_Drop: false
    Scope:
        Enable: true
        Night_Vision: false
        Zoom_Amount: 6
        Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 0.2
        Zoom_Before_Shooting: true
        Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: ENDERDRAGON_WINGS-2-2-0

手枪:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&fPistol "
        Item_Type: 271
        Item_Lore: "&7&l这把枪必须开启瞄准镜之后才能射击|&8&m----------------------------|&7&L类型: 手枪|&7&l武器等级: 4|&7&l伤害: 8|&7&l射程: 远|&7&l装弹数量: 12|&8&m----------------------------|&a&l死亡掉落"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 1
        Bullet_Spread: 0
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Remove_Arrows_On_Impact: true
        Projectile_Speed: 40
        Projectile_Damage: 8
        Sounds_Shoot: ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-2-0,ITEM_BREAK-1-2-0
    Headshot:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 2
        Message_Shooter:
        Message_Victim:
        Sounds_Shooter: NOTE_PLING-1-2-0
        Sounds_Victim:
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 12
        Take_Ammo_On_Reload: true
        Reload_Duration: 44
        Sounds_Reloading: NOTE_STICKS-1-1-0,NOTE_STICKS-1-1-10,NOTE_STICKS-1-1-20,NOTE_STICKS-1-1-30,NOTE_STICKS-1-1-40
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-0.3-2-0
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Terrain: true

如果好的话请给个赞如果有什么要改进的写在下面的弹窗里
